solution_line_template: The total distance Terese runs is {monday_miles} + {tuesday_miles}+{thursday_miles} +{wednesday_miles} = <<{monday_miles}+{tuesday_miles}+{thursday_miles}+{wednesday_miles}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles.
Therefore, she runs with an average distance of {total_distance} /{num_days} = <<{total_distance}/{num_days}={average_distance}>>{average_distance} miles.
